Package com.app.utils

Class JsonUtil

java.lang.Object
com.app.utils.JsonUtil
public class JsonUtil extends Object
A utility class that provides simplified JSON operations using Jackson ObjectMapper. This class offers methods for serialization, deserialization, and JSON manipulation with built-in null checks and exception handling.
Since:
2024-03-19
Version:
1.0
Author:
Edmund Tutuma

  • Method Details

    • toJson

      public static String toJson(Object obj)
      Converts a Java object to its JSON string representation.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to be converted to JSON
      Returns:
      a JSON string representation of the object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input object is null
      RuntimeException - if serialization fails

    • fromJson

      public static <T> T fromJson(String json, Class<T> clazz)
      Converts a JSON string to a Java object of the specified class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type parameter for the target class
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON string to deserialize
      clazz - the target class to convert the JSON into
      Returns:
      an instance of T containing the deserialized data
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either json or clazz is null
      RuntimeException - if deserialization fails

    • toJsonFile

      public static void toJsonFile(OutputStream outputStream, Object obj, WriteOptions options)
      Writes a Java object as JSON to an output stream with optional pretty printing.
      Parameters:
      outputStream - the stream to write the JSON to
      obj - the object to be written as JSON
      options - configuration options for JSON writing (can be null)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if outputStream or obj is null
      RuntimeException - if writing to the stream fails

    • fromJsonFile

      public static <T> T fromJsonFile(InputStream inputStream, Class<T> clazz)
      Reads JSON from an input stream and converts it to a Java object.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type parameter for the target class
      Parameters:
      inputStream - the stream containing JSON data
      clazz - the target class to convert the JSON into
      Returns:
      an instance of T containing the deserialized data
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either inputStream or clazz is null
      RuntimeException - if reading from the stream fails

    • fromJsonArray

      public static <T> List<T> fromJsonArray(String json, Class<T> clazz)
      Converts a JSON array string to a List of objects of the specified class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type parameter for the list elements
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON array string to deserialize
      clazz - the class type of the list elements
      Returns:
      a List of type T containing the deserialized data
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if deserialization fails

    • fromJson

      public static <T> T fromJson(String json, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference<T> typeReference)
      Converts a JSON string to a Java object using a TypeReference for complex types. Useful for generic types like List<CustomObject> or Map<String, CustomObject>.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type parameter for the target type
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON string to deserialize
      typeReference - the TypeReference describing the target type
      Returns:
      an instance of T containing the deserialized data
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if deserialization fails

    • toJsonNode

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode toJsonNode(Object obj)
      Converts a Java object to a Jackson ObjectNode. Useful for dynamic JSON manipulation.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to convert to an ObjectNode
      Returns:
      an ObjectNode representation of the input object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if conversion fails

    • fromJsonNode

      public static <T> T fromJsonNode(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node, Class<T> clazz)
      Converts a Jackson JsonNode to a Java object of the specified class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type parameter for the target class
      Parameters:
      node - the JsonNode to convert
      clazz - the target class to convert the node into
      Returns:
      an instance of T containing the converted data
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if conversion fails
